metadata.name: Better Unique Isaac Fight
metadata.description:
That mod is a reworked version of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2563988750]Unique Isaac Boss Fight[/url] created by Laraz created for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2847697646]Improved & Reworked Foes[/url]
Unique to this mod: - Lazarus and Judas won't fight their postmortem versions (Lazarus II and Dark Judas) but instead they'll fight against purified version of themselves* - Azazel's spirite has been replaced by Repented Azazel from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3329555283]Salvation[/url]*
Carried over from predecessor: - Resprited Angelic Baby while playing as Cain, Lilith or Jacob* - "Leaving body" mechanic for Lost and Soul
* These changes are now configurable via Mod Config Menu
